alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 8:06PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kemper and northeastern Lauderdale Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 806 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tamola, or 13 miles southeast of De Kalb, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Tamola around 820 PM CDT. Lauderdale around 830 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
